mean_en: an action or a movement of your body that happens naturally in response to something and that you cannot control; something that you do without thinking
sentence: If someone taps your under the kneecap, a reflex causes your foot to kick out.
sentence_trans: 如果敲打膝盖骨下方，你的脚就会条件反射弹起。
word_etyma: re反 ＋ flex弯曲 → reflex反射，反射光
